work_areas.title: AI Backend Architecture
work_areas.description: Governance, policy, runtime, LLM, budget, RAG, and audit core.

work_areas.title: Backend Infrastructure and Data Model
work_areas.description: Multi-user schema, execution persistence, search, jobs, observability, deployment.

work_areas.title: Template System and Packaging
work_areas.description: Template contracts, installation, versioning, and safety.

work_areas.title: Reporting and Analytics
work_areas.description: Metrics pipeline, APIs, exports, and performance gates.
